ticker.alpha: max(0, min(((1 - ((abs(POS_X - PLAYER_X) + abs(POS_Z - PLAYER_Z)) / 30)^3)), ((1 - ((abs(POS_Y - PLAYER_Y)) / 15)^2))))*(0.35)* sin((0.075 * AGE))
ticker.remove_condition: max(0, min(((1 - ((abs(POS_X - PLAYER_X) + abs(POS_Z - PLAYER_Z)) / 35)^1)), ((1 - ((abs(POS_Y - PLAYER_Y)) / 20)^1)))) == 0
